data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of The Board Meeting Under Regulation 29 And Regulation 50 Scheduled To Be Held On February 6 2026
data.news_body:
Fusion Finance Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 06/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve In pursuance of Regulation 29 Regulation 50 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of Fusion Finance Limited (Company) is scheduled to be held on Friday February 06 2026 inter-alia to consider and approve the following: 
 
(i) Un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine-months period ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Receipt Of Trading Approval For 566562 Equity Shares Converted From Partly Paid-Up Equity Shares To Fully Paid-Up Equity Shares.
data.news_body:
In continuation of our earlier communications dated November 08 2025 November 14 2025 and January 06 2026 we wish to inform you that 566562 equity shares of Rs. 10/- each which were converted from partly paid-up equity shares into fully paid-up equity shares on a rights issue basis had initially been rejected by the depositories during the corporate action process. 
We are pleased to inform you that the corporate action has now been successfully completed by the depositories. consequently the Company has received the trading approvals from BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Limited effective from January 28 2026 as per detailed disclosure enclosed.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of The Board Meeting Under Regulation 29 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India
(Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended ("SEBI Listing
Regulations")
data.news_body:
Fusion Finance Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Board Meeting of Fusion Finance Limited (Company) is
scheduled to be held on Tuesday November 04 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve the followings:
(i) Un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025;
and
(ii) Fund raising by issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) on Private Placement basis in
compliance with SEBI (Issue and Listing of Non-Convertible Securities) Regulations 2021 and other laws
for the time being in force and subject to such approvals as may be required in this regard.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter dated May 24, 2023 regarding Audio Recording of Earnings Conference Call on the Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023, we hereby inform that the transcript of the above said earnings conference call held on May 23, 2023 at8:30 am, is available on the Company's website www.fusionmicrofinance.com.

data.caption: Audio Recording Of Earnings Conference Call
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter no. FMFL/SEC/2023-24/SE-20 dated May 18, 2023 regarding intimation ofEarnings Conference Call on the Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March31, 2023, we hereby inform that the aforesaid call was held on May 23, 2023 at 8:30 am (IST) as per theschedule and the audio recording of the same has been uploaded on the Company's website atwww.fusionmicrofinance.com. This can be accessed via the following link:Link: https://fusionmicrofinance.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/JMF1720230523147223.mp3The transcript for the above said call will be shared with the Stock Exchanges and will also be uploaded onthe Company's website (www.fusionmicrofinance.com) in due course.

data.caption: Machine Readable Copy Of Financial Results
data.news_body: In continuation to our previous letter dated 11.02.2023 and pursuant to Regulation 30, Regulation 33, Regulation 51, Regulation 52 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in pursuance to NSE Circular No. : NSE/CML/2018/02 dated January 16, 2018 and BSE Circular No. LIST/COMP/22/2017-18 dated January 16, 2018, we hereby submit the machine readable copy of Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter & Nine Months Period ended on December 31, 2022 along with Limited Review Report thereon issued by M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants, as Statutory Auditors of the Company. The same is also available on the website of the Company i.e. www.fusionmicrofinance.com.

data.news_body: In continuation to our letter dated February 10, 2023 regarding intimation of Earnings Conference Call on the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022, this is to inform that the audio recording of the above said call held on February 13, 2023 at 8:30 am, has been uploaded on the Company's website www.fusionmicrofinance.com. This can be accessed via the following link:Link : https://fusionmicrofinance.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/JMF1720230213145943.mp3The transcript for the above said call will be shared with the Stock Exchanges and will also be uploaded on the Company's website (www.fusionmicrofinance.com) in due course.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting, Financial Results For The Quarter & Nine Months Period Ended On December 31, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30, Regulation 33, Regulation 51, Regulation 52 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held on Saturday, the 11th day of February 2023 has, inter-alia, approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter & Nine Months Period ended on December 31, 2022 along with Limited Review Report thereon issued by M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants, as Statutory Auditors of the Company. The aforesaid Board Meeting started at 3:00 PM and concluded at 6:20 p.m.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30, Regulation 51 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Earnings Presentation with respect to Financial Results for Quarter and Half Year ended on September 30, 2022. data.caption:
Regulation 33 And Regulation 52 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter &
Six Months Ended On 30Th September 2022
data.news_body:
This is to inform that pursuant to Regulation 33, Regulation 52 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and six months ended September 30, 2022, as reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in their respective meetings held today, the 28th November, 2022. The Limited Review Report issued by M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, the
Statutory Auditors of the Company is also attached herewith.
The aforesaid Board Meeting started at 7:20 PM and concluded at 8:30 p.m.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Regulation 30, Regulation 33, Regulation 51, Regulation 52 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing
Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Outcome Of Board Meeting.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30, Regulation 33, Regulation 51, Regulation 52 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing
Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the
Company in its meeting held on Monday, the 28th day of November 2022 (from 7:20 pm to 8:30 pm) has approved
the following:
1. Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter & Half Year ended on September 30, 2022 along with Limited
Review Report thereon issued by M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants, as Statutory Auditors
of the Company.
2. Proposal to raise funds by issue of Non-Convertible Debentures, aggregating up to INR 145 crores, on private
placement basis.
